title: Review: Ayodele Casel Returns to the Joyce With ‘Chasing Magic’
description: Originally a virtual production earlier in the pandemic, this live version features an improvised duet between Casel and the pianist Arturo O’Farrill.
dc:creator: Brian Seibert
media:description: Ayodele Casel, center, and fellow dancers performing in “Chasing Magic” at the Joyce Theater.
